mainText:
I am a 15 year old teenager from southern California who loves Apple and 
its products. I have the privilege of saying that I lived through the 
Steve Jobs era. I lived through the products that Steve had created. 
Although I may not have known Steve I have been influenced by his works. 
He has been a great influence in my life. He changed the world of 
technology.  Even though I will never get the chance to meet him, I feel 
as though I already have, through Apple.
author: Brian
